President of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam Truong Tan Sang recalled the visit of great leader Heydar Aliyev to Vietnam back when he was represented in the government of the Soviet Union .

RelatedSentence: He said the people of Vietnam were very appreciative of great leader Heydar Aliyev 's attention to Vietnam .

The sides also exchanged views on different aspects of bilateral relations between Azerbaijan and Vietnam , including the cooperation within international organizations and the expansion of cooperation in energy , science , investment and other spheres .
